response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration, we propose a purchase price of $750,000 for this product. We understand its significance and have tailored this offer to ensure you receive a fair deal while allowing us to maximize the value of our asset. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 750000}
